title: Please help....

embed.description: Strange kind of DC (without real DC ingame). Ping is rock-solid, but i can't controll my champ at all. I can see everytihng what's going on, can use chat - all included in video. Don't worry about strange flickering of game UI, it's recording fault and not visible ingame.

body:
my ms and fps is normal. but lately got somekind of dc and i see whole game normal but its only me who cant move or use abilities or chatt...got few reports because no1 belives me..and lost lot of games...ill be happy with any help..
it happened to more ppl as i saw on web but still 0 fixes...

replies.body: Hmmmm that looks like it might be some major packet loss you're dealing with there. Grab the network logs from that match if you can and let this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan it. Post an image of what it gives you here so I can take a look over it with you!
